column4: Ok UXRVT I need to know if there is anyway to change any of its options, and if I can where do I do it at?
rxvt is a better teminal emulator.
I don't want opinions thanks, just how to change RXVT's options thanks
I want to change background colors and stuff, or atleast its palatte.
wait, there is nothing with that name in ~/
rxvt doesn't have its own config files?
not really no .. without that file, rxvt uses its defaults
there is this when I type 'locate rxvt' :
if you want to adjust rxvt settings.. create an ~/.Xdefaults file and add your settings in
I found the examples file :( Im an idiot ...
why would nice values really matter?
because sometimes you want your X apps to have a lower nice value than system services
